message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $102?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $97 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
